members.name: Tanner Despain

armor.name: Titanium Armor
armor.style: Heavily plated scout-armor built for rough terrain, impacts, and shield wall formations

abilities: High durability and damage resistance
Anchor-point defense, holding lines under pressure
Protecting younger Cobros during retreats or evacuations
members.personality: Steady, responsible, and very protective of the younger guys.
bio: As one of the adult leaders of Cobros 314, Tanner acted as their walking shield.
During The Return, he died standing between Sam’s corrupted power and the youth he once led.
members.notes: Remembered as the wall that refused to move—even when it cost him everything.

members.name: Ethan Workman

armor.name: Schriker Rig
armor.style: Light, angular armor with avian and sonic-mobility design cues

abilities: Burst-speed charges and rapid flanking
High-intensity battle cries that disorient enemies
Hit-and-run tactics to peel pressure off teammates
members.personality: Loud, brave, and always the first into danger if it meant helping someone else.
bio: Ethan turned aggression into protection.
In The Return, he tried to redirect Void-twisted fire away from the Cobros youth and was killed in the attempt.
members.notes: His absence is still felt whenever the team needs someone to make the crazy first move.

members.name: Wesley Holbrook

armor.name: Warlock Gear
armor.style: Cloaked armor with rune-like energy channels and support modules

abilities: Deploys buff fields to strengthen allies
Short-range portals and reposition tools
Mystic-style blasts adapted from Parliament tech
members.personality: Thoughtful, a little dramatic, and always experimenting with new tricks.
bio: Wesley turned support into an art form, weaving strange energy effects around the more physical Cobros fighters.
members.notes: Known for shouting spell names that are way more theatrical than necessary.

members.name: Josh Larson

armor.name: Juggernaut Armor
armor.style: Bulky power-armor with reinforced shoulders and kinetic dampeners

abilities: Charging through enemy lines and barriers
Absorbing and redirecting kinetic force
Protecting allies by drawing fire and attention
members.personality: Big-hearted, stubborn, and surprisingly gentle when he’s not smashing something.
bio: Josh was one of the adult Cobros leaders who survived The Return.
Carrying grief and survivor’s guilt, he became a living reminder of what the troop lost—and what still needs protecting.
members.notes: He visits the memorial sites of the fallen Cobros regularly.

members.name: Jonah Gray

armor.name: Echo Song Attire
armor.style: Light armor with audio-channel plating and harmonic nodes

abilities: Creates echoing sound fields that confuse enemies
Uses music and rhythm to stabilize allies emotionally
Subtle sonic shields that soften incoming impacts
members.personality: Calm, steady, and more observant than people realize.
bio: Jonah keeps Cobros grounded, giving them something solid to listen to when the world feels like it’s tearing apart.
members.notes: Often the one who starts singing quietly around campfires after missions.

members.name: Joseph Slack

armor.name: Caster Rig
armor.style: Mid-range armor with focus gauntlets and modular spell-emitters

abilities: Mid-range energy bolts and snares
Deployable wards that mark safe or dangerous zones
Combos with Warlock and Echo Song for layered effects
members.personality: Analytical, nerdy, and very good at reading the flow of a fight.
bio: Joseph became Cobros’ ‘tactical mage,’ covering gaps and reinforcing whoever was getting overwhelmed.
members.notes: Loves drawing diagrams of ideal battlefield layouts in his spare time.

members.name: Jaden Boyer

armor.name: Aether Blaze Armor
armor.style: Sleek energy-channel suit with glowing vents and arcing flames

abilities: Launches focused streams of aether-fire
Charges up finishers when allies pin targets down
Can briefly overclock his own armor at personal risk
members.personality: Passionate, intense, and sometimes a bit reckless.
bio: Jaden is Cobros’ living artillery, bringing big fire when the team commits fully to a push.
members.notes: He and Jonas have an unofficial competition over who can land the flashiest plays.

members.name: Jonas Boyer

armor.name: Sports Master Gear
armor.style: Agile armor with kinetic braces and multi-tool sports-weapon systems

abilities: Turns anything into a precision projectile
High agility, leaps, and rolls
Reads angles and bounces like a living physics engine
members.personality: Energetic, competitive, and fun to be around.
bio: Jonas takes the spirit of pick-up games and welds it onto real battles, turning Cobros skirmishes into something fast, fluid, and weirdly fun.
members.notes: Will absolutely call ‘trick shot’ before doing something insane.

members.name: Andrew DeDen

armor.name: Loneman Armor
armor.style: Camouflage-capable armor tuned for solo ops and overwatch

abilities: Long-range targeting and precision shots
Operating alone behind or ahead of lines
Quietly feeding intel back to the squad
members.personality: Reserved, observant, and comfortable on the edges of the group.
bio: Andrew keeps a watchful eye over the others from a distance, making sure they don’t get blindsided.
members.notes: Usually knows what’s coming five minutes before everyone else.

members.name: Jimmy Larson

armor.name: Renaissance Suit
armor.style: Adaptive armor with modular tool slots and interchangeable plates

abilities: Can plug into multiple combat and utility roles
Field repairs to armor and gear
Creative problem-solving under pressure
members.personality: Curious, inventive, and always tinkering.
bio: Jimmy fills gaps.
If Cobros needs a medic, a mechanic, or a backup fighter, he steps into it.
members.notes: The kind of guy who always has the one tool nobody thought to pack.

members.name: Johnathon Gray

armor.name: Vocalnought Armor
armor.style: Reinforced chest and throat modules, shock-absorbing helm

abilities: Devastating powered shouts and sonic bursts
Breaking enemy lines and formations with sound
Drowning out enemy comms and panic-noise
members.personality: Loud in power, but not always in personality—he can be surprisingly mellow off the field.
bio: Johnathon is Cobros’ sonic battering ram, clearing paths when physical barriers won’t budge.
members.notes: Carries ear protection for allies as part of his standard loadout.

members.name: Nick Larsen

armor.name: Iron Guard Armor
armor.style: Shield-focused armor with large plating and deployable barriers

abilities: Creates layered overlapping shields
Bodyguard-style protection for key allies
Holding chokepoints almost single-handedly
members.personality: Quietly kind, thinking of others first almost by reflex.
bio: Another of the adult Cobros leaders, Nick died in The Return shielding youth from Sam’s corrupted assault.
His barriers bought them seconds that turned into survival.
members.notes: His name is often spoken in the same breath as ‘sacrifice’ when Cobros tell their story.

members.name: Vanner Johnson

armor.name: Viral Rig
armor.style: Sleek armor with hacking spikes and EMP nodes

abilities: Disrupts enemy tech and armor systems
Spreads disabling ‘virus’ effects through linked devices
Softens targets before big pushes
members.personality: Clever, a bit snarky, and proud of every system he bricks.
bio: Vanner makes sure Cobros never fights a fair fight—he stacks the odds in their favor by tearing the enemy’s tools apart.
members.notes: He considers it a personal insult if enemy armor actually works properly.

members.name: Tommy Holbrook

armor.name: Swift Shadow Armor
armor.style: Dark, flexible scout armor with muted plating and speed-channel seams

abilities: Silent high-speed movement
Shadow-based engagement and disengagement
Strikes from blind spots with precise timing
members.personality: Quiet, efficient, and focused — moves like a ghost when the mission demands it.
bio: Tommy is Cobros’ infiltration edge, slipping through the battlefield unseen and delivering quick disabling hits.
members.notes: He's often mistaken for an illusion because of how little noise he makes.

members.name: Rick Holly

armor.name: Valor Knight Armor
armor.style: Knight-inspired armor with strong moral-themed sigils and defensive anchoring systems

abilities: Generates morale-boosting auras
Holds defensive positions under heavy fire
Shields allies through sheer force of will
members.personality: Noble, dependable, and impossible to intimidate.
bio: Rick embodies the idea of standing firm no matter the odds, giving Cobros a frontline they can always anchor to.
members.notes: His armor design is intentionally reminiscent of medieval knights — by his own request.

members.name: Trent Cook

armor.name: Captain’s Armor
armor.style: Command-grade armor with expanded HUD visibility and coordination channels

abilities: On-the-fly battlefield command
Reading teammate strengths and reallocating them fast
Keeping Cobros formations stable under fire
members.personality: Calm, focused, and empathetic — the kind of leader people want to follow.
bio: Trent rose as the natural commander after the adult leaders fell, helping the remaining Cobros reorganize after The Return.
members.notes: Not the loudest, but absolutely the backbone of any Cobros formation.

members.name: Robbie Petersen

armor.name: Quickstrike Armor
armor.style: Lightweight, aerodynamic armor for sudden melee dashes and flurries

abilities: High-speed melee combos
Ambush-style takedowns
Precision hit confirmation on weakened targets
members.personality: Quick-talking, cocky, but surprisingly thoughtful when it counts.
bio: Robbie specializes in finishing moves and rapid engagements — the guy who hits before enemies know it started.
members.notes: Known for calling his shots before making them — and then landing them perfectly.

members.name: Alex Wood

armor.name: Vortex Flash Armor
armor.style: Whirlwind-themed armor with electric and wind-channel design

abilities: High-speed vortex dashes that knock enemies off balance
Combining wind and motion to redirect projectiles
Creating brief safe corridors through chaotic battlefields
members.personality: Encouraging, high-energy, and loved by the youth he led.
bio: Another of the Cobros adult leaders, Alex died in The Return trying to spin a path out of the storm Sam had become.
He pulled as many as he could out of the blast radius.
members.notes: The idea of ‘running into the storm for others’ is now tied to his name.

members.name: Micheal

armor.name: Guardian Sentinel Armor
armor.style: Knight-paladin hybrid armor with radiant shield emitters

abilities: Projecting powerful shield barriers
Resisting corruption and fear-based attacks
Providing emotional stability to teammates
members.personality: Sincere, steady, and deeply protective.
bio: Micheal is one of Cobros’ emotional pillars, grounded in faith and able to calm even the most shaken members.
members.notes: Carries quiet spiritual weight in the squad — everyone feels safer when he’s around.

members.name: Kyle

armor.name: Jugridge Armor
armor.style: Mountain-themed fortress armor with high-ground stabilizers

abilities: Holding elevated positions against overwhelming numbers
Absorbing tremendous damage
Creating choke points the enemy cannot break
members.personality: Calm, dependable, and immovable in every sense.
bio: Kyle died holding a ridge alone so the younger Cobros could escape.
His stand is now legendary across the troop and Parliament records.
members.notes: Remembered as the last line of defense — literally.
